Question
========

A stochastic variable X follows a normal distribution, X \~ N(1, 0.5^2^). The probability that X takes a negative value is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0
* 0.0228
* 0.3413
* 0.5

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0: Incorrect
* 0.0228: Correct
* 0.3413: Incorrect
* 0.5: Incorrect
